Fj newgen = Why is security & privacy important?

> Information or Data is a corporate asset, like any other assets in the organization > Corporate data (customers or employees) is at a higher risk of theft or misuse than ever before » Rising Cyber attacks/threats

> Obligations to protect personal information or data due to: * Laws and Regulations, ex. GDPR, HIPAA, PDPA, etc. * Contract with the Customer

Contract with the Third Parties/Service Providers

Fj newgen = ISO 27001:2013

What is ISO 27001

it specifies requirements for establishing, implementing, maintaining and continually improving an information security management system within the context of the organization.

commonly known as Information Security Management System (ISMS)

provides approach for conducting business-driven risk assessment, to identify and treat security risks according to the organization's risk appetite and tolerance.

Family of ISO 27001 - Information Security Management System * ISO/IEC 27000:2018: Overview & vocabulary * ISO/IEC 27002:2013: Code of practice for information security controls * ISO/IEC 27005:2018: Information security risk management

10 UNLOCK SIMPLE

Fj newgen = Information Security - Overview

\sgets

something that has value to the organization. Controls

An asset extends beyond physical goods

or hardware, and includes software, information, people, and reputation

policies, procedures, and guidelines for managing risk

the potential cause of an incident that may result in a breach of information security or compromise business operations.

rreats UNLOCK SIMPLE

a weakness of a control or asset.

Vulneraiifies

= Information Security Triad

Fj newgen

Confidentiality: To protect and preserve the confidentiality of information means to ensure that it is not made available or disclosed to unauthorized entities. In this context, entities include both individuals and processes.

Integrity : To preserve the integrity of information means to protect the accuracy and completeness of information and the methods that are used to process and manage it.

Availability: All of these assets must be available to authorized entities when they need to access or use them.

12 UNLOCK SIMPLE

Fj newgen

= Service Organization Control (SOC)

What are SOC Reports

are designed to help service organizations build trust and confidence in their service delivery through an attestation report by an independent 3rd Party Auditor

are examination or attestation reports of the effectiveness of implemented controls in the organization.

Types of SOC Reports * SOC 1 Type 2: Focused on internal security controls related to financial reporting

SOC 2 Type 2: Focused on internal security controls related to

Security,

Availability, Processing Integrity Confidentiality and/or Privacy

Fj newgen = Payment Card Industry —- Data Security Standard

What is PCI-DSS * isa collection of best security practices formulated by PCI Security Standards Council in 2006. * PCI Security Standards Council comprises of Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, and JCB.

Why is PCI-DSS required * To ensure the security of the environment that stores, processes or transmits account data or card data.

Who has to implement it * entities responsible for storing, processing or transmitting account data or card data.

entities providing services to customers who is storing, processing or transmitting account data or card data.

= Payment Card Industry — Data Security Standard

Build and Maintain a Secure Network

» Install and maintain a firewall configuration to protect cardholder data

» Do not use vendor-supplied defaults for system passwords and other security parameters

Protect Card Holder Data

» Protect stored cardholder data

» Encrypt transmission of cardholder data across open, public networks

Fj newgen = Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act

What is HIPAA

isa U.S. federal law with primary goal to protect the confidentiality and security of healthcare information and help the healthcare industry control administrative costs.

¢ Why is HIPAA required

ensures the security and privacy of individuals’ health information in any form * addresses the use and disclosure of individuals’ health information

Who has to implement it

itis applicable to all the Covered Entities and Business Associates who are processing ePHI of any individual.

Covered Entities or Data Controller - Insurance Companies, Hospitals, Medical Centres, Physicians, etc.

Business Associates or Data Processors - Business or individual who provides service to the covered entity etc.

18 UNLOCK SIMPLE

Fj newgen = lypes of Controls or Safeguards

¢ Administrative Safeguards

these are the administrative functions that should be implemented to meet the security standards. These include assignment or delegation of security responsibility to an individual and security training requirements.

Physical Safeguards

these are the mechanisms required to protect electronic systems, equipment and the data they hold, from threats, environmental hazards and unauthorized intrusion. Ex. include restricting access to ePHI and retaining off site computer backups.

Technical Safeguards

these are primarily the automated processes used to protect data and control access to data. Ex. include using authentication controls to verify that the person signing onto a computer is authorized to access that ePHI, or encrypting and decrypting data as it is being stored and/or transmitted.

19 UNLOCK SIMPLE

Fj newgen = General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)

What is GDPR * It is a European Regulation that has replaced the Data Protection Act. * It is a regulation which has given more power and freedom to the Data Subject. * Itis applicable since 25 May 2018

Why is GDPR required

It was required to strengthen the controls necessary for ensuring the privacy of the personally identifiable information (PII) of a Data Subject, held by Data Controllers and Data Processors.

Who has to implement it

Itis applicable to all the Data Controllers and Data Processors, who are processing Personally Identifiable Information (PII) of a Data Subject.

Data Controller

a person/organization who determines the purposes for which any personal data are, or are to be, processed.

Ex. - Newgen’s customer - Newgen when - collecting employees Pll - collecting prospect employee Pll - collecting prospective customer PII

= Entities in Privacy Ecosystem

Data Processor

a person (other than an employee of the data controller) who processes the data on behalf of the data controller.

Ex. - Newgen processing data on behalf of its customer - Newgen’s 3 party vendor - BGV Vendor - AWS - Azure, etc.

BB newgen

Data subject - an individual who is the subject or the owner of personal data.

Ex.

Newgen’s customer’s client

Newgen’s employees

Newgen’s prospective customer

21 UNLOCK SIMPLE

BB newgen = Important definitions

¢ Processing: * Any operation or set of operations which is performed on personal data or on sets of personal data (Ref: GDPR)

Personal Data: * Information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (‘Data Subject’) (Ref: GDPR)

Ex. name, an identification number, location data, or to one or more factors specific to the physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social identity of that natural person.

Personal Data sometimes is also referred as Personally identifiable information (PII).

Personally identifiable information (PII)

Any information about an individual that can be used to distinguish or trace an individuals identify and any other information that is linked or linkable to an individual. (Ref: NisT)

Personal Data Breach:

Abreach of security leading to the accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, alteration, unauthorized disclosure of, or access to, personal data transmitted, stored or otherwise processed. (Ref: GDPR)

BB newgen

= Policy on Workstation

Do not download/install software, freeware, open source, application, etc. on your computing device without any authorization.

Do not impersonate other employees’ user id and password for accessing unauthorized computing device.

Do not put Highly Confidential/Restricted/Newgen Confidential information on your computing device desktop. [Clear screen]

Keep hardcopies of ‘Highly Confidential/Restricted/Newgen Confidential’ in your lock & key. [Clear desktop]

Do not change your computing device default IP address using any available method. Do not try to change the system settings or try to delete the audit logs from your computing device. Do not stop or disable the installation of operating system, anti-virus, email client, etc.

While WFH, if you are using your personal device for official purpose or to connect to your Newgen machine, ensure you have anti-virus installed in it.

Take help from Newgen CSD (IT) Team to install official anti-virus.

28 UNLOCK SIMPLE

= Policy on Internet

Privileges of internet usage shall be given as per the business requirements. Access internet proxy using your own domain user id and password. Do not traverse to web sites other than for the business use.

Do not use any medium other then authorized by Newgen for accessing internet while connected to Newgen network.

Do not misuse privilege for * accessing web sites which do not have a business requirement or * download any application, software, firmware, open source.

Files with extension pdf, doc, xls, ppt can be downloaded through internet with size restriction of 25 mb.

BB newgen

30 UNLOCK SIMPLE

Fj newgen

= Policy on Incident Reporting

Report any security breach or security weakness when observed at irr@newgen.co.in

Provide related information (including evidences/facts) while reporting an incident.

Sanctions or Disciplinary Actions can be taken if found guilty

Employee should not test the information processing systems amples for identifying or testing the known vulnerabilities or BeUelonpireteceoriverciintatiecrparinetten ces weaknesses

Disabling Antivirus in you computing devices

Sharing of customer personal information with unauthorized

Frequent tailgating

Entering Critical Areas or Cloud Access Zone (CAZ) without the authorization.

Use of a utility of other measures to disable or block the controls implemented by CSD (IT). Ex. Move Mouse

30 UNLOCK SIMPLE

BB newgen = Policy on Secure FTP * Secure FTP is the recommended method of sharing the solution/ production deliverable to external stakeholders * Do not make any project release through e-mail. ¢ User shall request for a Secure FTP account based on his respective Group Head approval. ¢ A quota of 200 MB will be provided by default which may be increased ¢ User shall be the accountable for the integrity of the content ¢ User shall ensure that the contractual obligations are being met for FTP account

Query or complaint to be reported at ftpadmin@newgensoft.com

= Policy on Antivirus

Every computing device is required to have antivirus

Ensure that anti-virus software is active all the time on the computing device Do not try to modify or in any way tamper the antivirus settings

Do not stop or remove antivirus in any scenario

Get the incoming portable storage media scanned from CSD for virus/malware presence

Get computing device/storage media scanned after using in another network Report incident to CSD immediately using best available methods in case

Do not attempt to destroy or remove a virus or any evidence of virus by yourself; take assistance from CSD (IT)

While WFH, if you are using your personal device for official purpose or to connect to your Newgen machine, ensure you have anti-virus installed in it * Take help from Newgen CSD (IT) Team to install official anti-virus

32 UNLOCK SIMPLE

BB newgen

= Policy on Laptop

Do not download/install software, freeware, open source, application, etc. on your computing device without any authorization.

Do not leave your computing device unsecured/unattended.

Do not impersonate other employees’ user id and password for accessing unauthorized computing device.

Do not put Highly Confidential/Restricted/Newgen Confidential information on your computing devices desktop. [Clear screen]

Keep hardcopies of ‘Highly Confidential/Restricted/Newgen Confidential’ in your lock & key. [Clear desktop]

Do not change your computing device default IP address using any available method. Do not try to change the system settings or try to delete the audit logs from your computing device. Do not stop or disable the installation of operating system, anti-virus, email client, etc.

Do not use any unauthorized method to access computing device from unauthorized network.

33 UNLOCK SIMPLE

ZB newgen = Policy on Password

¢ Ensure that all information and information processing systems are password protected

¢ Minimum Password Length: 8 characters * Maximum Age: 42 calendar days

Minimum Age: 2 calendar days

Password History: 5 passwords

¢ Lockout threshold: 5 invalid attempts

Fj newgen

= Policy on User Access Management

Always display Newgen ID and Access card inside the office premise. Do not use other employees’ ID and/or Access Card for any purpose. Do not tailgate for entry into the restricted area.

Do not try access card in restricted areas like Server Room/Hub room/Cloud Access Zone/UPS room etc., otherwise asked for justification.

If you forget to bring permanent ID and/or Access Card, security will issue a temp id and/or access card (for 1 day only)

Return your ID/Access card to the Admin department on the last day of service.

User access to all the information processing systems is reviewed by the project manager.

Anyone who is not in the CAZ Authorization List will be treated as a visitor to Cloud Access Zone (CAZ).

No mobile device shall be used inside the CAZ, to connect to the cloud

production environment. 35

UNLOCK SIMPLE

BB newgen

= Policy on E-mail

Newgen e-mail service is intended for Newgen business purpose only Do not disguise or attempt to disguise your identity when sending e-mail Do not make any project release through e-mail

Do not deceive the file extension by either masking (i.e., changing of file extension) or any other means

Do not use e-mail (Newgen and/or Personal) for product/project testing E-mail id shall be disabled in case of any violation of this policy or other related ISMS policies

Production data not to be shared on e-mail with any relevant stakeholder.

UNLOCK SIMPLE

BB newgen

= Policy on Print Devices

Print Devices are intended only for Newgen business purpose

Ensure Newgen Print Center (NPC) is installed in your computing device Printouts within Newgen network is expected to be taken out from NPC only Do not leave any confidential information unattended on print devices

Do not take printout of the production environment/data

Ensure that the buffer/page caches in print devices is cleared

Printed material if not of use to be scrapped/destroyed as soon as possible using

shredder machines

While WFH, do not take out a printout of official documents unless you have a

business reasons/justification 37 UNLOCK SIMPLE

Fj newgen = Data Subject Request Handling Guideline

Newgen Employees or Customer can put up any query/request or complaint related to their Rights as a Data Subject or related to privacy of their data.

Queries/requests or complaints related to privacy can be sent at privacy@newgensoft.com.

The Queries/requests or complaints are to be resolved within 30 days from the date of receiving it.

Timelines to respond to the Queries/requests or complaints from Newgen Customer (Data Controller) may vary depending on the contractual agreement.

« Newgen employee can use Data Subject Request (DSR) form to raise the requests.

¢ Newgen will help the data subject in completing the request for information i.e., DSR Form.

39 UNLOCK SIMPLE

BB newgen

= Policy on Asset Management

Newgen Employees or Customer can put up any query/request or complaint related to their Rights as a Data Subject or related to privacy of their data.

Queries/requests or complaints related to privacy can be sent at privacy@newgensoft.com.

The Queries/requests or complaints are to be resolved within 30 days from the date of receiving it.

Timelines to respond to the Queries/requests or complaints from Newgen Customer (Data Controller) may vary depending on the contractual agreement.

« Newgen employee can use Data Subject Request (DSR) form to raise the requests.

Newgen will help the data subject in completing the request for information i.e., DSR Form.

ZB newgen

= Policy on Virtual Machine

Get Group Head approval in-case VM Image (Testing Server) is required.

Do not install any unauthorized or unlicensed software on VM. * Do not configure any e-mail client on VM.

¢ Folder containing the confidential information to be avoided. If share is required provide it with password protection.

¢ No Customer production data will be stored or processed in the VM.

UNLOCK SIMPLE

ZB newgen

= Policy on Tele-Working

3 ES OST ELH UE

TTT

s ean he wdwares

Tele-working or telecommuting means working on a. Newgen environment from outside Newgen premises and/or b. Client environment from outside Newgen premises

Do not leave any computing device connected to the Newgen or Client provided network, unattended.

Do not download any restricted access documents, data files, or other classified material from the organization without prior approval from their supervisor.

Don’t save password in the VPN client that shall be used for the connection.

Never copy any information onto the removable media or computing device other Newgen provided while tele-working.

If an Employee suspects or believes that his/her computing device is infected with a virus, he/she shall report such incident to CSD immediately by best available methods.

Two-factor authentication shall used for connecting to Newgen network.

Employee shall be responsible for taking all the necessary measures to ensure the preservation of confidentiality, integrity and availability of Newgen and Customers’ intellectual property in any form
